12069.quoteText: As is common in the advertising industry, we use cookies, pixels, and other technologies (collectively, "cookies")
12069.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

12087.quoteText:
What Personal Information About Customers Does Amazon Collect?

We collect your personal information in order to provide and continually improve our products and services.

Here are the types of personal information we collect:
12087.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

12088.quoteText: Like many websites, we use "cookies" and other unique identifiers
12088.title: This service requires first-party cookies

tosdr.case: This service requires first-party cookies

12089.quoteText:
For What Purposes Does Amazon Use Your Personal Information?

We use your personal information to operate, provide, develop, and improve the products and services that we offer our customers. These purposes include:
12089.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

12090.title: The service collects many different types of personal data

tosdr.case: The service collects many different types of personal data
tosdr.tldr:
Full quote: "What Personal Information About Customers Does Amazon Collect?

We collect your personal information in order to provide and continually improve our products and services.

Here are the types of personal information we collect: Information You Give Us: We receive and store any information you provide in relation to Amazon Services. Click here to see examples of what we collect. You can choose not to provide certain information, but then you might not be able to take advantage of many of our Amazon Services. Automatic Information: We automatically collect and store certain types of information about your use of Amazon Services, including information about your interaction with content and services available through Amazon Services. Like many websites, we use "cookies" and other unique identifiers, and we obtain certain types of information when your web browser or device accesses Amazon Services and other content served by or on behalf of Amazon on other websites. Click here to see examples of what we collect. Information from Other Sources: We might receive information about you from other sources, such as updated delivery and address information from our carriers, which we use to correct our records and deliver your next purchase more easily. Click here to see additional examples of the information we receive."

12091.quoteText: We use your personal information to recommend features, products, and services that might be of interest to you, identify your preferences, and personalize your experience with Amazon Services.
12091.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

12093.quoteText: We make available to you services, products, applications, or skills provided by third parties for use on or through Amazon Services.
12093.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

12094.quoteText: You can tell when a third party is involved in your transactions, and we share customers' personal information related to those transactions with that third party.
12094.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: This service can share your personal information to third parties

12095.quoteText: Third-Party Service Providers: We employ other companies and individuals to perform functions on our behalf. Examples include fulfilling orders for products or services, delivering packages, sending postal mail and email, removing repetitive information from customer lists, analyzing data, providing marketing assistance, providing search results and links (including paid listings and links), processing payments, transmitting content, scoring, assessing and managing credit risk, and providing customer service.
12095.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

12096.quoteText:
Also, in the unlikely event that Amazon.com, Inc.
or substantially all of its assets are acquired, customer information will of course be one of the transferred assets.
12096.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

12097.quoteText: As we continue to develop our business, we might sell or buy other businesses or services. In such transactions, customer information generally is one of the transferred business assets but remains subject to the promises made in any pre-existing Privacy Notice (unless, of course, the customer consents otherwise).
12097.title: The service may sell your data unless you opt out

tosdr.case: The service may sell your data unless you opt out

12098.quoteText:
We release account and other personal information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law.
enforce or apply our Conditions of Use and other agreements.
or protect the rights, property, or safety of Amazon, our users, or others.
12098.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

12100.quoteText: Other than as set out above, you will receive notice when personal information about you might be shared with third parties, and you will have an opportunity to choose not to share the information.
12100.title: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties

12101.quoteText:
How Secure Is Information About Me?

We design our systems with your security and privacy in mind.

  • We work to protect the security of your personal information during transmission by using encryption protocols and software.
  • We follow the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) when handling credit card data.
  • We maintain physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards in connection with the collection, storage, and disclosure of personal customer information. Our security procedures mean that we may occasionally request proof of identity before we disclose personal information to you.
  • Our devices offer security features to protect them against unauthorized access and loss of data.
12101.title: The user is informed about security practices

tosdr.case: The user is informed about security practices

12102.quoteText:
We provide ad companies with information that allows them to serve you with more useful and relevant Amazon ads and to measure their effectiveness.
We never share your name or other information that directly identifies you when we do this.
Instead, we use an advertising identifier like a cookie or other device identifier.
12102.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

12103.quoteText: For example, if you have already downloaded one of our apps, we will share your advertising identifier and data about that event so that you will not be served an ad to download the app again.
12103.title: Your profile is combined across various products

tosdr.case: Your profile is combined across various products
tosdr.tldr: According to the excerpt, usage/activities from different apps will affect targeted advertising towards you. Your activities and overall profile are combined across the different products you may or may not own.

12104.quoteText: Last updated: January 1, 2020. To see prior version, click here.

12105.quoteText:
If you do not want to receive email or other communications from us, please adjust your Customer Communication Preferences.
If you don't want to receive in-app notifications from us, please adjust your notification settings in the app or device.
12105.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

12106.quoteText:
Because cookies and identifiers allow you to take advantage of some essential features of Amazon Services, we recommend that you leave them turned on.
For instance, if you block or otherwise reject our cookies, you will not be able to add items to your Shopping Cart, proceed to Checkout, or use any Services that require you to Sign in.
For more information about cookies and other identifiers, see our Cookies Notice.
12106.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

12107.quoteText: If you want to browse our websites without linking the browsing history to your account, you may do so by logging out of your account here and blocking cookies on your browser
12107.title: This service can view your browser history

tosdr.case: This service can view your browser history

12108.quoteText: In addition, to the extent required by applicable law, you may have the right to request access to or delete your personal data. If you wish to do any of these things, please contact Customer Service. Depending on your data choices, certain services may be limited or unavailable.
12108.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

12109.quoteText:
Our business changes constantly, and our Privacy Notice will change also.
You should check our websites frequently to see recent changes.
12109.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

tosdr.case: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

12110.quoteText: If you have any concern about privacy at Amazon, please contact us with a thorough description, and we will try to resolve it.
12110.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
